__e: All of my efforts to protect and provide comfort for my family...
You will have to get rid of your love for Marianne to cease to pay your attentions to a person I intend for myself, and to marry very soon the wife I have chosen for you.
I appreciate you taking care of our son.
He's going through a very rough time, and he really will appreciate all of this.
Well, I appreciate the elbow grease, but, uh, we're still short.
I doubt you'll believe it, but... I respect the effort.
But this time, Adam is absolutely innocent.
The sad irony that, with all your effort, the people you cared most about saving, they're the ones that got hurt the worst.
Despite your feeble efforts to change the future, you can't.
